imprisoned,"},{"lineNumber":249682,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王であるケイブリスの前に立ちはだかる。","translatedEnglishLine":"stood up in front of Kebris, the Demon Kebris"},{"lineNumber":249688,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっさりと健太郎を踏み潰した。","translatedEnglishLine":"simply crushed Kentaro Wielder."},{"lineNumber":249692,"originalJapaneseLine":"　くっくっくっ、予想よりも痛快だぜ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kukukuku, it's even more thrilling than I expected."},{"lineNumber":249693,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間で俺に逆らえる奴が消えたってのは」","translatedEnglishLine":"That the humans who could defy me have vanished.\""},{"lineNumber":249694,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いや、一人だけ残ってたな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No, there was one person left."},{"lineNumber":249695,"originalJapaneseLine":"　忘れちゃいけねぇ大事な奴が」","translatedEnglishLine":"An important person I must not forget.\""},{"lineNumber":249696,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そうだな、今度はこっちから行ってやるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...That's right, this time I'll come to them.\""},{"lineNumber":249697,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――さあ、これから世界は面白くなるぜぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—Now, the world is going to get interesting...\""},{"lineNumber":249698,"originalJapaneseLine":"馬鹿笑いを上げ、ケイブリスが城から旅立った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Laughing foolishly, Kebris set off from the castle."},{"lineNumber":249699,"originalJapaneseLine":"「可哀想なアリオス。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Poor Arios."},{"lineNumber":249700,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんな姿でも生きているんですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Even in that state, you're still alive."},{"lineNumber":249701,"originalJapaneseLine":"　熱いですかー、痛いですかー、辛いですかー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is it hot? Does it hurt? Is it painful?\""},{"lineNumber":249702,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ッ……ッ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...!!...!!\""},{"lineNumber":249703,"originalJapaneseLine":"声は出せない。","translatedEnglishLine":"He can't make a sound."},{"lineNumber":249704,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、五感は全て激痛に塗りつぶされ、","translatedEnglishLine":"No, all five senses are overwhelmed by intense pain,"},{"lineNumber":249705,"originalJapaneseLine":"本当に自分が声を出そうとしたかすら分からない。","translatedEnglishLine":"he doesn't even know if he truly tried to make a sound."},{"lineNumber":249706,"originalJapaneseLine":"今、この瞬間もアリオスは体にまとわりつく","translatedEnglishLine":"Even at this moment, Arios is wrapped in"},{"lineNumber":249707,"originalJapaneseLine":"地獄の業火のような熱風に、","translatedEnglishLine":"a hellish, fiery hot wind swirling around his body,"},{"lineNumber":249708,"originalJapaneseLine":"全身を生きたまま焼かれていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"being burned alive all over."},{"lineNumber":249709,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……貴方は今、奇跡的な幸運が重なり、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You now survive only because of an extraordinary stroke of luck,"},{"lineNumber":249710,"originalJapaneseLine":"　かろうじて生きている状況です」","translatedEnglishLine":"barely clinging to life.\""},{"lineNumber":249711,"originalJapaneseLine":"「普通ならショック死するほどの苦痛でも、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Pain that would normally kill you from shock,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前本気で俺様に勝てるつもりだったのか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you seriously think you could beat me?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gwahahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 笑いながらの雑な腕の一振り。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A careless swing of the arm while laughing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでさえアリオスは対応が遅れ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even so, Arios was slow to react,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま壁に叩きつけられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and was slammed straight into the wall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただの一振り。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a single swing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧倒的な力の差を前に、勇者であるアリオスは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Faced with an overwhelming difference in strength, Arios, the hero,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにも出来ずに倒れ伏した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: fell down helpless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、勇者特性がアリオスを奇跡的に生かした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the hero's traits miraculously kept Arios alive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほーう？　とんでもなく運のいい奴だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hoo? What an unbelievably lucky guy you are."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なら、これで死んどけや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, die from this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスが熱い息をふっと吹き出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kebris let out a hot breath with a puff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはただの熱風だが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was just hot air,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鉄すら溶かすほどの高温の息。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it was a scorching breath hot enough to melt iron.
"Eh, ah, wha...!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その熱風がアリオスの体にまとわりつく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hot wind wrapped around Arios's body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「グゥウウアァアアァアアアアァ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guuuuaaaaahhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人の悲鳴とも思えぬような絶叫が響く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A scream echoed that could hardly be considered human.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その息は俺のお手製だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That breath is my own creation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前が死ぬまで解けはしねぇ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It won't dissipate until you die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ俺様の呪いみたいなもんだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, you could say it's like a curse from me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「てか、できるかなーと思ったら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I thought maybe I could do it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当にこんなこと出来ちまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I actually ended up being able to do something like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐぁははは、すげーな魔王の力」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gwahahaha, the power of the Demon Lord is amazing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よしよし、これで勇者は始末完了っと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, alright, the hero is taken care of now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次は――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next—"
"Wai... wait..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹への人質の為、生かさず殺さず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For the hostage Miki, neither killing nor letting live,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 半死半生のまま監禁されていた健太郎が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro, who was half-dead and imprisoned,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王であるケイブリスの前に立ちはだかる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stood up in front of Kebris, the Demon Lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「美樹……ちゃんを……どこに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Miki... chan... where have you...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: か、返せ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: R-return her..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うるせぇぞ、羽虫」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shut up, little insect."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間をかけることすら面倒に感じ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Feeling it troublesome even to take time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 感慨もなにもなく、ケイブリスは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: without any sentiment, Kebris

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっさりと健太郎を踏み潰した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: simply crushed Kentaro underfoot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足をどかすとそこには、人の形をしていない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When he moved his foot away, there lay something no longer human in shape,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎だったものが転がっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what used to be Kentaro rolled on the ground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よしよし、勇者と日光の使い手を殺したぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There, there, I've killed the hero and the Sunlight Wielder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっくっくっ、予想よりも痛快だぜ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kukukuku, it's even more thrilling than I expected.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間で俺に逆らえる奴が消えたってのは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That the humans who could defy me have vanished."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いや、一人だけ残ってたな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, there was one person left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忘れちゃいけねぇ大事な奴が」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An important person I must not forget."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そうだな、今度はこっちから行ってやるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's right, this time I'll come to them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――さあ、これから世界は面白くなるぜぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—Now, the world is going to get interesting..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 馬鹿笑いを上げ、ケイブリスが城から旅立った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Laughing foolishly, Kebris set off from the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「可哀想なアリオス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Poor Arios.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな姿でも生きているんですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even in that state, you're still alive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 熱いですかー、痛いですかー、辛いですかー？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it hot? Does it hurt? Is it painful?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 声は出せない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He can't make a sound.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、五感は全て激痛に塗りつぶされ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, all five senses are overwhelmed by intense pain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に自分が声を出そうとしたかすら分からない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he doesn't even know if he truly tried to make a sound.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、この瞬間もアリオスは体にまとわりつく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even at this moment, Arios is wrapped in

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地獄の業火のような熱風に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a hellish, fiery hot wind swirling around his body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全身を生きたまま焼かれていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: being burned alive all over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……貴方は今、奇跡的な幸運が重なり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You now survive only because of an extraordinary stroke of luck,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かろうじて生きている状況です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: barely clinging to life."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「普通ならショック死するほどの苦痛でも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Pain that would normally kill you from shock,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Is it painful?\""},{"lineNumber":249702,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ッ……ッ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...!!...!!\""},{"lineNumber":249703,"originalJapaneseLine":"声は出せない。","translatedEnglishLine":"He can't make a sound."},{"lineNumber":249704,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、五感は全て激痛に塗りつぶされ、","translatedEnglishLine":"No, all five senses are overwhelmed by intense pain,"},{"lineNumber":249705,"originalJapaneseLine":"本当に自分が声を出そうとしたかすら分からない。","translatedEnglishLine":"he doesn't even know if he truly tried to make a sound."},{"lineNumber":249706,"originalJapaneseLine":"今、この瞬間もアリオスは体にまとわりつく","translatedEnglishLine":"Even at this moment, Arios is wrapped in"},{"lineNumber":249707,"originalJapaneseLine":"地獄の業火のような熱風に、","translatedEnglishLine":"a hellish, fiery hot wind swirling around his body,"},{"lineNumber":249708,"originalJapaneseLine":"全身を生きたまま焼かれていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"being burned alive all over."},{"lineNumber":249709,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……貴方は今、奇跡的な幸運が重なり、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You now survive only because of an extraordinary stroke of luck,"},{"lineNumber":249710,"originalJapaneseLine":"　かろうじて生きている状況です」","translatedEnglishLine":"barely clinging to life.\""},{"lineNumber":249711,"originalJapaneseLine":"「普通ならショック死するほどの苦痛でも、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Pain that would normally kill you from shock,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前本気で俺様に勝てるつもりだったのか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you seriously think you could beat me?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gwahahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 笑いながらの雑な腕の一振り。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A careless swing of the arm while laughing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでさえアリオスは対応が遅れ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even so, Arios was slow to react,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま壁に叩きつけられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and was slammed straight into the wall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただの一振り。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a single swing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧倒的な力の差を前に、勇者であるアリオスは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Faced with an overwhelming difference in strength, Arios, the hero,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにも出来ずに倒れ伏した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: fell down helpless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、勇者特性がアリオスを奇跡的に生かした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the hero's traits miraculously kept Arios alive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほーう？　とんでもなく運のいい奴だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hoo? What an unbelievably lucky guy you are."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なら、これで死んどけや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, die from this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスが熱い息をふっと吹き出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kebris let out a hot breath with a puff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはただの熱風だが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was just hot air,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鉄すら溶かすほどの高温の息。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it was a scorching breath hot enough to melt iron.
"Eh, ah, wha...!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その熱風がアリオスの体にまとわりつく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hot wind wrapped around Arios's body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「グゥウウアァアアァアアアアァ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guuuuaaaaahhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人の悲鳴とも思えぬような絶叫が響く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A scream echoed that could hardly be considered human.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その息は俺のお手製だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That breath is my own creation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前が死ぬまで解けはしねぇ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It won't dissipate until you die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ俺様の呪いみたいなもんだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, you could say it's like a curse from me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「てか、できるかなーと思ったら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I thought maybe I could do it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当にこんなこと出来ちまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I actually ended up being able to do something like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐぁははは、すげーな魔王の力」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gwahahaha, the power of the Demon Lord is amazing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よしよし、これで勇者は始末完了っと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, alright, the hero is taken care of now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次は――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next—"
"Wai... wait..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹への人質の為、生かさず殺さず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For the hostage Miki, neither killing nor letting live,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 半死半生のまま監禁されていた健太郎が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro, who was half-dead and imprisoned,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王であるケイブリスの前に立ちはだかる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stood up in front of Kebris, the Demon Lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「美樹……ちゃんを……どこに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Miki... chan... where have you...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: か、返せ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: R-return her..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うるせぇぞ、羽虫」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shut up, little insect."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間をかけることすら面倒に感じ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Feeling it troublesome even to take time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 感慨もなにもなく、ケイブリスは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: without any sentiment, Kebris

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっさりと健太郎を踏み潰した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: simply crushed Kentaro underfoot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足をどかすとそこには、人の形をしていない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When he moved his foot away, there lay something no longer human in shape,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎だったものが転がっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what used to be Kentaro rolled on the ground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よしよし、勇者と日光の使い手を殺したぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There, there, I've killed the hero and the Sunlight Wielder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっくっくっ、予想よりも痛快だぜ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kukukuku, it's even more thrilling than I expected.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間で俺に逆らえる奴が消えたってのは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That the humans who could defy me have vanished."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いや、一人だけ残ってたな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, there was one person left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忘れちゃいけねぇ大事な奴が」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An important person I must not forget."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そうだな、今度はこっちから行ってやるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's right, this time I'll come to them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――さあ、これから世界は面白くなるぜぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—Now, the world is going to get interesting..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 馬鹿笑いを上げ、ケイブリスが城から旅立った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Laughing foolishly, Kebris set off from the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「可哀想なアリオス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Poor Arios.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな姿でも生きているんですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even in that state, you're still alive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 熱いですかー、痛いですかー、辛いですかー？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it hot? Does it hurt? Is it painful?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 声は出せない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He can't make a sound.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、五感は全て激痛に塗りつぶされ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, all five senses are overwhelmed by intense pain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に自分が声を出そうとしたかすら分からない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he doesn't even know if he truly tried to make a sound.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、この瞬間もアリオスは体にまとわりつく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even at this moment, Arios is wrapped in

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地獄の業火のような熱風に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a hellish, fiery hot wind swirling around his body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全身を生きたまま焼かれていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: being burned alive all over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……貴方は今、奇跡的な幸運が重なり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You now survive only because of an extraordinary stroke of luck,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かろうじて生きている状況です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: barely clinging to life."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「普通ならショック死するほどの苦痛でも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Pain that would normally kill you from shock,
